page.title: 17Celebrations - Christmas
page.content: At Christmas our family celebrats by putting up a Christmas tree which has tinsel, Christmas lights etc. We also have a roast dinner and give presents to friends, relatives and among ourselves. Occasionally we go to an Xmas party at my uncles pub, but not every year. Each year our old next door neighbours come and visit us or we go and visit them. Our presents from my Mum and Dad are left outside my sisters and my bedrooms. The presents from relatives and friends are left under the tree, and we open them after breakfast on Christmas morning. I often go and call for my friend and we look at each others presents. My Dad hires a video film and we watch it in the afternoon. Also friends and relatives send cards to us. Christmas is the only time Mum and Dad get a cup of tea made by me!
